Interface RemoteStockRW_I

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, RemoteStockR_I
All Known Implementing Classes:
R_StockRW
public interface RemoteStockRW_I extends RemoteStockR_I, Remote
Defines the RMI interface for read/write access to the stock object. Extends RemoteStockR_I to include write operations. Provides methods for managing stock levels, adding products, and updating product details. This interface is used to define the methods that can be called remotely via RMI. Each method throws RemoteException to handle network-related issues and StockException for stock-related errors.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Mike Smith University of Brighton

  • Method Details

    • buyStock

      boolean buyStock(String number, int amount) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Buys stock by decrementing available quantity.
      Parameters:
      number - The product number to purchase
      amount - The quantity to buy
      Returns:
      true if the purchase is successful, false if insufficient stock
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock

    • addStock

      void addStock(String number, int amount) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Adds stock to an existing product.
      Parameters:
      number - The product number to add stock to
      amount - The quantity to add
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock

    • modifyStock

      void modifyStock(Product detail) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Modifies stock details for a given product number. Information modified: Description, Price.
      Parameters:
      detail - The product details to be modified
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock

    • setStock

      void setStock(String productNum, int quantity) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Sets the stock level for a specific product.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to update
      quantity - The new stock level
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock

    • addProduct

      void addProduct(Product product) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Adds a new product to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to add
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If the product already exists or there is an error accessing the stock

    • getProducts

      List<Product> getProducts() throws RemoteException, StockException
      Retrieves all products from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all products
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock

    • updateProductImage

      void updateProductImage(String productNum, String imagePath) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Updates the image path for a product.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to update
      imagePath - The new image path
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock

    • deleteProduct

      void deleteProduct(String productNum) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Deletes a product from the database.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to delete
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the stock
